subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: CHULA VISTA, Calif. (AP) — Arielle Martin’s husband is never there to see the hours of training she puts in on her bike these days. He is not home for dinner, or to talk about her day. He does not go to her BMX races, or follow her around the globe as she competes for a spot on the United States Olympic team.
